ComicInfo.Summary:
The story is set in 2999, with Vampirella and Pantha acting as protectors of the city. Crazed and whacked out robots begin to tear apart the city, with Vee and Pantha being able to put a stop to some of the destructive droids. They have a harder time with one of the rampaging bots and are saved by Johnny Banzai, who is flirtatious with Vampirella, trying to win her over. Pantha thinks something is off with Johnny, which we later find out she was right. Johnny is the one responsible for the evil droids, who created them in an effort to impress Vee when he "beat" them.
Long story short, they find out, Vee destroys the control equipment, and the robot enters a real destructive rampage. She uses Johnny like a "human missile" to defeat the robot, then Pantha and Vee ride off into the sunset.
